name: Lur
appearance: Tall, pale lattice of living bone sheathed in waxed linen, eyes set with soft amberglass. Movements careful and quiet.
character: Gentle and literal-minded, eager to help and to learn the songs that make the lattice settle.
talents: Singing counter-melodies that calm bone growth
Standing motionless for hours without complaint
flaws: Fear of glass saints and mirrors
Torn by split loyalties to masters
dreams: Be recognized as a citizen, not a tool
Learn to carve their own bone safely
Walk the Skyhook without fear of lightning
secrets: Hears the Engine in dreams whispering their name
Once opened the locked lattice ward to comfort a crying child
Carried a small resin bundle for Keth without knowing its contents
